DOC.brief_title: Development Study Using Vaginal Tactile Imager
DOC.detailed_description: Pelvic organ prolapse affect 40-50 % woman US . This study aim establish reliable examination procedure , collect data necessary assessing performance Vaginal Tactile Imaging sensor , assess clinical suitability interface software correlate elasticity measurement clinical examination finding normal versus prolapse condition female pelvis .
DOC.criteria: 1. evidence pelvic organ prolapse prior pelvic surgery 2. stage 1 great pelvic organ prolapse affect one vaginal compartment 3. evidence pelvic organ prolapse prior pelvic surgery ( without use graft material ) 1. patient active skin infection , tissue breakdown ulceration 2. patient abnormal vaginal anatomy , include vaginal septum , history vaginal/pelvic radiation , presence vaginal tumor lesion 3. recent pelvic surgery le 3month interval surgery
